description:
godoc: update metadata upon launch

Without this change it's possible to launch godoc,
immediately GET /, and see a directory listing instead of root.html

messages.text:
Hello gri (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=770d062819a9 ***

godoc: update metadata upon launch

Without this change it's possible to launch godoc,
immediately GET /, and see a directory listing instead of root.html

R=gri
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5575054

subject: code review 5575054: godoc: update metadata upon launch
